EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Perfecting the Software Life Cycle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/agile/webinar/perfecting-the-software-life-cycle]]> Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar Perfecting the Software Life Cycle. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, June 29, 2016 Time: 11:00AM PDT/6:00PM GMT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1203420/4FA3F9A5CC8A9D5A96A775EDA7F970A3]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
